title: string "\\\'" will cause an unexpected "unknown escape sequence" compiler error
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. http://play.golang.org/p/4haM7DdDVe

What is the expected output?
The code should be compiled.

What do you see instead?
Compiler generates an error says "unknown escape sequence".

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
go playground

Please provide any additional information below.
It seems only "\\\'" doesn't work. Others like "\\\"" and
"\\\t" work fine.
